articles.title: Proteas spearhead Kagiso Rabada rested for ODI series against India
articles.description: Proteas seamer, Kagiso Rabada won't take part in the upcoming ODI series against India, Cricket South Africa announced on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Proteas speedster, Kagiso Rabada won't take part in the upcoming ODI series against India, Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced on Tuesday.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: ECB to investigate early-hours party
articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board will investigate after police were called to break up the players' post-Ashes party.
articles.content:
Players from both teams traditionally get together after the final Test of an Ashes series

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
